Static Variables Details

public baseURL : String

the absolute root url

public dirtyInterval(default,setInterval) : Int

Timer interval

public dirtyList : List<haxegui.controls.Component>

List of dirty components

public dirtyTimer : haxe.Timer

Timer to watch dirty components

public gridSnapping : Bool

Whether to snap to grid on move operations

public gridSpacing : Int

Grid spacing in pixels

private initializers : List<{ f : Void -> Void, c : Class<Dynamic>}>

Private

Static Methods Details

public init() : Void

Initialize the haxegui system
It calls the initializing function for all Components in the the initializers list, starts the dirty timer, and sets up the mouse & cursor managers.

private onInterval() : Void

public register(c : Class<Dynamic>, ?f : Void -> Void) : Void

parameters
Component class
Initialization function called when Haxegui is initialized
Component registration. Used during the boot process to register all components.

public setDirty(c : haxegui.controls.Component) : Void

parameters
Component
Mark a component for redrawing

public setInterval(v : Int) : Int

public toggleSnapping() : Bool

Toggle the gridSnapping on and off.
